mapper.select:
select u.*,p.orgname provincialName,p.abbr abbr,c.orgname cityName,d.orgname regionName from customer u left join organ p on u.province = p.orgid and p.level = 1 and p.valid = 1 left join organ c on u.city = c.orgid and c.level = 2 and c.valid = 1 left join organ d on u.region = d.orgid and d.level = 3 and d.valid = 1 where 1=1
and u.companyname like "%"#{companyName}"%"
and u.domain like "%"#{domain}"%"

select u.*,p.orgname provincialName,p.abbr abbr,c.orgname cityName,d.orgname regionName from customer u left join organ p on u.province = p.orgid and p.level = 1 and p.valid = 1 left join organ c on u.city = c.orgid and c.level = 2 and c.valid = 1 left join organ d on u.region = d.orgid and d.level = 3 and d.valid = 1 where u.id=#{id}

select u.*,p.orgname provincialName,p.abbr abbr,c.orgname cityName,d.orgname regionName from customer u left join organ p on u.province = p.orgid and p.level = 1 and p.valid = 1 left join organ c on u.city = c.orgid and c.level = 2 and c.valid = 1 left join organ d on u.region = d.orgid and d.level = 3 and d.valid = 1 where u.domain=#{0} and u.id != #{1}
